title: His Christmas Angel
description: Forced to volunteer at the hospital is the last thing Chase Masters wants to do over the Winter Break. He’d rather be spending his days on the snow with his friends. After all, it was only a little trouble that he caused…Christmas is Angelina’s Smith favorite time of year. She loves the bustle of helping out at her family’s Christmas Tree Farm. It doesn’t seem fair that she’s scheduled for chemo treatment the week of Christmas.When Chase mistakes Angelina for a fellow volunteer, the two don’t exactly get off to the best of starts, but the Spirit of Christmas is a wondrous thing…Can Chase and Angelina open their hearts and find the joy of Christmas together?
author: Kylie Key
